sentences.english: This paper presents a case study on surplus thermal power being exchange between power grids and associate prices.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹一網間空閒火電容量交換的案例研究。

sentences.english: They are also better for the earth than coal or gas power stations.
sentences.chinese: 而且比起火電站來說，對地球沒有污染。

sentences.english: For improving thermal efficiency, the mechanical properties of newly high chromium steels were tested and studied.
sentences.chinese: 爲提高火電廠的效率對新的高鉻鋼性能進行了研究。

sentences.english: They do consume electricity, generated by coal fire plants.
sentences.chinese: 電動自行車消耗電能，而電是由火電廠發的。

sentences.english: Power plant pollution from coal plants is still a huge issue.
sentences.chinese: 但火電廠產生的污染仍然是個大問題。

sentences.english: The hydraulic ash transportation gaius increasingly wide application in thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 水力輸灰在火電廠中獲得越來越廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: Dry emission of dry ash is the important problem to be solved by the newly founded or broadened power stations.
sentences.chinese: 幹灰幹排是新擴建火電廠首要解決的排灰方式。

sentences.english: Water and steam are the working media of thermodynamic facility in power plant .
sentences.chinese: 在火電廠中，水和蒸汽是熱力設備中的工質。

sentences.english: The load control problem of the fossil-fired electric single generating units is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了火電單元機組負荷控制問題。

sentences.english: TIANJIN, China — China’s frenetic construction of coal-fired power plants has raised worries around the world about the effect on climate change.
sentences.chinese: 中國火熱的燃煤火電廠建設引起了世界的不安。

sentences.english: The forced outage of fossil-fired power machines is mainly caused by the failure of boiler pipe.
sentences.chinese: 鍋爐管子故障是造成火電機組強迫停機的主要原因。

sentences.english: GNET is an integrated graphical modeling environment used in power plant simulator.
sentences.chinese: GNET是火電廠仿真機圖形建模一體化環境。

sentences.english: Perhaps as the thermal power no longer entanglements, "electricity shortage" is an abrupt end.
sentences.chinese: 或許當火電不再糾結時，“電荒”也就戛然而止。

sentences.english: Such a mathematical model is being used on a thermal power station simu…
sentences.chinese: 模型已使用在火電廠模擬控制檯上。

sentences.english: Fireworks must be banned in thermal power stations to prevent explosions.
sentences.chinese: 火電站一定要禁止煙火，以防發生爆炸。

sentences.english: According to technical requirements to design parameters of FGD towers for coal power plants.
sentences.chinese: 根據技術要求設計火電廠脫硫除霧器相關參數。
